events.title: Brew Day - Reminder - Batch #27 (SMaSH Godiva v2)

notes.note: Bottles from the brew shed to indoors.
Added 7.02 grams Godiva leaf hops for dry hopping.

recipe.notes:
Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
v2: skipped on the bittering hops for flavour and aroma additions.
recipe.teaser: Single malt and single hops British Golden Ale with Pale Ale Maris Otter malt and Godiva hops.
recipe.name: SMaSH Godiva v2
recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter
